result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .HuntTheWumpus.SetUp (edit)
fitlibrary.DoFixture
start HuntTheWumpus.fixtures.GameDriver

Import
fit
HuntTheWumpus.fixtures
If the player shoots an arrow through a cavern that contains the Wumpus, the wumpus dies, and the game is over.

Expand All | Collapse All

start end direction

2 3 E
3 4 E
4 5 E
6 7 S
7 3 S
3 8 S
8 9 S

Shoot towards the East.
